function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of social media data for disease tracking","Impact":"Potential privacy breaches and misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy policies and data protection measures","Technologies":"AI, data analytics, and privacy protection tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Data analytics company, government regulators, and data protection authorities"},{"Description":"Contact-tracing app tracking personal movements","Impact":"Privacy concerns and risk of location data misuse","Mitigation":"Implement strong data encryption and user-controlled data sharing","Technologies":"AI, app development, and data encryption tools","People":"General public","Owner":"App developers, government regulators, and data protection authorities"},{"Description":"Use of AI in healthcare chatbots","Impact":"Risk of misdiagnosis and incorrect medical advice","Mitigation":"Regular validation and monitoring of chatbot performance, and oversight by medical professionals","Technologies":"AI, NLP, and medical validation tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, AI developers, and medical regulators"}]}
